name: Sheeps Of Tomorrow
description:
Sheeps of Tomorrow

While the residents of the keep are protected by the walls of the castle, Nancy has received a huge task. Defend the castle of the neverending horde of sheep. How many sheep can you kill before the castle is destroyed?

Information

No updates on the game are expected for now. Nevertheless, the game is not complete and bugs may occur. The game was mainly created to train my coding skills

Credits Code & few assets

Toon van der Have
